name: Pecan Pie Bars
author: Shirley Eftink
instructions: Preheat oven to 350Â°. Reserve 2/3 cup cake mix. Combine remaining mix with oleo and 1 egg. Mix well. Pour in greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake 15 to 20 minutes until golden brown. Combine 2/3 cup cake mix with brown sugar, syrup, vanilla and 3 eggs. Mix well. Pour over baked crust. Sprinkle with pecans. Bake 40 minutes.
